conclusion: A drives into the table from the right side where several scattered blocks and a marble are placed.
A is moving from the right side of the table towards the left.
The yellow block and the blue block are in the path of A.
A appears to be a toy car with a certain amount of kinetic energy.
A will collide with the yellow block, causing it to move and possibly change direction.
The yellow block is not in the direct path of A's final destination, which is the blue block.
A will continue to move towards the blue block after colliding with the yellow block.
A will eventually stop near the blue block due to the loss of kinetic energy and the resistance from the blue block.
A will collide with the yellow block and the blue block, and it will eventually stop near the blue block.
